headline: Vancouver & Montreal, Canada: CloudFlare's latest data centers
keywords: Cloudflare Network, Canada, Data Center, North America, Holidays
description:
With the holiday season in full swing, it's only fitting that we continue to
spread cheer, joy and a faster Internet around the world. To start the season we
begin in Canada with NHL rivals Montreal and Vancouver, our 70th and 71st points
of presence (PoPs) globally. Montreal and Vancouver, the 2nd and 3rd largest
Canadian metropolitan areas, respectively, join our existing PoP in Canada's
largest, Toronto
[https://blog.cloudflare.com/toronto-cloudflares-18th-data-center/].

Together, CloudFlar
